title: kindred and janna op
body: So if you have a kindred and janna on your team then janna can ult in the last sec of kindred's ult and push out all enemy's making it so they will be on 10% hp and you can just clean them up with your 50% hp or so its so op late game and there is 0 counter play.

replies.body:
Cleanse.
QSS.
Don't get caught in Kindred's ult.

> [{quoted}](name=Pack a Bag,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=3QZL0Efi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-15T06:55:42.338+0000)
>
> Cleanse.
> QSS.
> Don't get caught in Kindred's ult.

Wait wot, think you need to look up what these ults do

>
> Wait wot, think you need to look up what these ults do

This is just the average GD poster. I don't know what anything does but everyone is always saying cleanse QSS for op champs so i will say it too. I know nothing, don't get caught in ult Get Gud scrub.

> [{quoted}](name=Vi Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=3QZL0Efi,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-10-16T09:07:11.698+0000)
>
> This is just the average GD poster. I don't know what anything does but everyone is always saying cleanse QSS for op champs so i will say it too. I know nothing, don't get caught in ult Get Gud scrub.

my only response is wot
I wasn't talking about you ;p, i was agreeing with your point.
what do you think kindred's ult does
you just played a game with kindred and janna and probably won and now you're here to brag about how you think you've found the new meta. no....just no......

No if you think about it it will work unless you cc Janna all the time as the ult is about to stop Janna ults stoping the heal of all the enemy in kindred's ult and healing your team for a lot and keeping them at 10% hp letting you clean up with your 50% + hp think about it. 
But if you do see some pro players doing this in afew weeks and you will the second they find out about this remember I came up with it first.

lol ok m8. might be a bit more than a few weeks though, the pros are playing on 5.18 in worlds and the next split starts in like late january, but dw im sure there wont be any better metas coming up until then than kindred janna bot. might have to wait til march to get your trophy of recognition for outstanding achievement in meta discovery
ahahah lol probs but we will all know that I discovered it xD
Or they can just play janna, and push your whole team our of the ult. Killing them and making your ult useless. New meta
gigapube if you are going to be toxic go to /b/
honestly i think kindred / karthus in teamfights would be a lot more scary.
But an enemy Janna can knock out all the allies in kindred ult to save her teammates

Then Malph ults in with ori ball and top lane yasuo follows up and Ezreal throws an ulti in for the massive wombo from 4 10% HP champs then they all run and step on shrooms that support Teemo was planting behind them for the official pentakill.
